entry.title: Oven baked chicken
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • 3 chicken breast
  • 2 carrots
  • few brussels sprouts
  • 2 potato
  • 3 tps olive oil
  • 4 finely chopped garlic cloves
  • pepper, salt, chill powder
  • roughly chopped coriander

Method

  1. Chop carrots ðŸ¥•, brussels sprouts, potato ðŸ¥”, and broccoli into big pieces. Put them in a tray mix them with 2 table spoons of olive oil and spread them evenly.

  2. Wash the chicken breast and place them on top of the evenly spread veggies apply olive on to the chicken breast give it a little massage ðŸ’† so that oil spreads evenly. Make sure that you give the massage on both the sides. Then sprinkle pinch of salt, petter, chill powder and spread them evenly on both sides. Add the chopped garlic on top of each chicken breast. Place the chicken breast on top of veggies. TIP: The more you massage the more tastier it will be. ðŸ¤£

  3. Pre heat oven to 400Â°F or 220Â°C. Baked the chicken for 45min until the chick becomes soft and tender.

  4. When the chicken is done, remove the chicken & veggies from the oven and garnish with coriander and eat it.

entry.title: Roasted chicken
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • 3 chicken legs
  • 2 onion, thickly sliced
  • 1 lemon slice
  • roughly chopped coriander
For Marination
  • 150ml pot natural yogurt
  • juice 1 lemon
  • 1 tsp each hot chilli powder, turmeric, ground coriander, ground cumin, garam masala and ground cinnamon
  • 2 tsp of ginger garlic paste
  • few drops red food coloring (optional)

Method

  1. Mix the marinade ingredients (chilli powder, turmeric, ground coriander, ground cumin, garam masala and ground cinnamon, lemon juice, ginger garlic paste, yogurt and few drops of food color) with Â¾ tsp salt and 1 tsp black pepper. Slash the legs of the chicken a few times, then rub the marinade all over. It tastes good if you can marinate in the fridge for a day 24 hours.
    TIP: Soak the chicken for few hours in salt water for even better taste before marination

  2. Pre heat oven to 450Â°F or 230Â°C. Roast the chicken for 45min to 1hr or until the juices run clear when tested with a skewer.

  3. When the chicken is done, remove the chicken legs from the oven and garnish with coriander — serve it will sliced onions and a slice of lemon.
